samples.current_output: Aama. Maintenance and Welfare of Parents Act 2007 padi children (including married daughters) parents-kku maintain seyyanum. Maintenance Tribunal-la claim pannalam. Max Rs.10,000/month. Non-compliance: 3 months imprisonment. Property transfer reverse aagalam.

Basic principles same. But commercial tenancy-kku: 1) Advance limit 6 months (residential-kku 3 months), 2) Rent increase reasonable-aa irukkanum, 3) Goodwill compensation ketkalam (long-term tenants), 4) Business loss-kku compensation ketkalam.

Responsibilities: Registration (some municipalities), vaccination, leash in public, damage liability. Pet cruelty: PCA Act - 3 months imprisonment + Rs.100 fine (old law, amendments pending). Noise nuisance: Neighbour complaint valid. Banned breeds: Check local rules.

Steps: 1) Marriage Registrar office-à®²à¯ form submit (30 days before), 2) Notice board-à®²à¯ display, 3) Objection period (30 days), 4) Marriage ceremony (Registrar à®®à¯à®©à¯), 5) Certificate issue. Witnesses: 3 à®ªà¯‡à®°à¯. Documents: Birth certificate, address proof, photos, affidavit.

Aama. Problem therinja naalilirundhu 2 years-kkul complaint kodukkanum. Special circumstances-la delay condone aagalam - valid reason irukkanum. Medical negligence cases-kku discovery date-la irundhu count aagum.

1) Time-kku rent kattuvathu, 2) Veetai nalla condition-la maintain seivathu, 3) Illegal activities seyyaamal iruppathu, 4) Neighbors-kku disturbance kodukaamal iruppathu, 5) Agreement terms follow seivathu, 6) Vacate seyyum mun notice koduppathu.

samples.instruction: Police vehicle seize panninaal eppadi release peruvathu?
samples.current_output: Steps: 1) Challan pay, 2) Required documents produce (license, RC, insurance), 3) Release order perunga, 4) Vehicle collect. Court custody-la irundhaal Court order venum. Seizure fee applicable. 24 hours-kkul Magistrate inform aaganum.

samples.instruction: RTI fee evvalavu? Eppadi pay panradhu?
samples.current_output: Central Government: Rs.10 (postal order, DD, cash). Tamil Nadu State: Rs.10. BPL card holders: Fee exempted. Additional: Rs.2 per page for copies. Online: rtionline.gov.in (central), rtionline.tn.gov.in (state). Court fee stamp-um accept.

First Appeal: Appellate Authority-kku 30 days-kkul (PIO-vin senior officer). Second Appeal: State/Central Information Commission-kku 90 days-kkul. No fee for appeals. Commission penalty podalam - Rs.250/day, max Rs.25,000.

samples.instruction: Owner repair seyya marukkiraar - rent kattaamal irukkalaama?
samples.current_output: Rent kattaamal irukka koodaadhu - idhu eviction-kku grounds aagividum. Instead: 1) Written notice kodunga, 2) Owner response illaattal repair seydhu receipt vaangunga, 3) Rent-la irundhu deduct seydhu balance kattunga, 4) Rent Authority-kku complaint kodunga.

samples.instruction: Hospital bill excessive-aa irukku - enna seyyalam?
samples.current_output: Itemized bill kelunga - hospital thara venum. Rate list display kattaayam (Clinical Establishments Act). Overcharging complaint: 1) State Health Department, 2) District Collector, 3) Consumer forum. Insurance involved-aa irundhaal TPA-kkum complaint podunga.

Online: myaadhaar.uidai.gov.in (demographic update). Offline: Aadhaar Enrolment Centre. Documents: Supporting proof for correction. Fee: Rs.50 (biometric update free). Time: 10-30 days. OTP verification required. Address update: Aadhaar app-à®²à¯à®®à¯ possible.

IPC 354D (stalking) - 3 years imprisonment (first offence), 5 years (repeat). IT Act 66D (cheating by personation). Evidence collect: Screenshots, call logs, messages. Platform block + police complaint. Women: Protection order under DV Act-à®‰à®®à¯ à®ªà¯†à®±à®²à®¾à®®à¯.

samples.instruction: Single mother rights à®à®©à¯à®©à¯†à®©à¯à®©? Documents-à®²à¯ father name à®µà¯‡à®£à¯à®®à®¾?
samples.current_output: Rights: 1) Birth certificate - mother name only acceptable, 2) School admission - father name not mandatory (Supreme Court), 3) Passport - mother as sole guardian okay, 4) Aadhar - single parent sufficient. Challenges: Some private institutions insist - quote Supreme Court judgment. Government schemes: Single mother pension available in TN. Child custody: Automatic to mother (unwed).

samples.instruction: Hit and run case-la compensation eppadi peruvathu?
samples.current_output: FIR podunga (vehicle details theriyaaviitalum). Motor Accident Claims Tribunal (MACT)-la claim. Hit and run compensation: Death - Rs.2 lakh, Grievous injury - Rs.50,000 (Solatium Scheme). Driver identify aanaal full compensation + criminal case.

Major repairs (roof leak, plumbing main line, electrical wiring, structural issues) - Owner responsibility. Minor repairs (tap washer, bulb, fuse) - Tenant responsibility. Agreement-la clearly mention irukkanum. Owner refuse pannina rent-la irundhu deduct seyyalam (with notice).

samples.instruction: Warranty period mudinja piragum complaint seyyalaamaa?
samples.current_output: Manufacturing defect-kku warranty period mudindhaalum complaint seyyalam. Product reasonable lifespan-kkul fail aanaal complaint valid. Example: TV 6 months-la blast aanaal, warranty 3 months mudindhirundhalum case podalam.
